extendedInfo.description: Commanderï¼Over 60 campaigns in 4 battlefields of World War II are waiting for your challenge.102 world famous generals will participate in this war with you.Over 300 real and rich terrains will influence your strategies.Player needs to make adequate use of battlefield terrains and defense facilities as well as expertise of each unit to win advantage. Cutting retreat route or encircling enemy will bring great change to battlefield situation. How to smartly deploy land, naval and air force to seize opponent's key strongholds is a question lingering in player's mind.Accumulation of Medals achieved through battles guides your way from soldier to marshal.Upgrade of military facilities in the headquarters will offer essential supply in the war.Recruit other officers to strengthen force. It's important to take advantage of each officer's expertise.Armoured troop commanded by General Rommel or naval troop by Nimitz will have maximum performance.Player can instruct any officer and his troop in battlefield to battle freely.Support online multiplayer mode. Player can compete with real friends through Wifi and Bluetooth or global players through Game Center. Adoption of Auto-matching tech will greatly improve chances of finding the opponent.3 levels of tutorial can ensure your quick learning of game basics.##Feature## -Campaign Mode- Western Front Battlefield Axis Powersï¼1939.9 - 1944.6ï¼ Allied Forcesï¼1940.5 - 1945.4ï¼ North Africa Battlefield Axis Powersï¼1940.5 - 1942.12ï¼ Allied Forcesï¼1940.12- 1943.3 ï¼ Eastern Front Battlefield Axis Powersï¼1941.6 - 1943.5ï¼ Allied Forcesï¼1941.10- 1945.4ï¼ Antarctic Battlefieldï¼1945.9 - ???ï¼ -35 Legion Mode campaigns -102 world class generals participated -128 military units available -37 countries involved in the war -36 tactical instructions -Support Game Center and Wi-Fi link battle -16 military ranks, 4 general assistants. -Over 300 real terrains. -Upgrade 6 military facilities in the headquarters -Map Zoom In/Out -Auto save function ...

reviews.title: Why just why
reviews.comment: Why do you insist on advertising that it has multiplayer when it doesnt. You do this on other games too!. I would be over the moon to have local multiplayer as in pass phone around. If it had this i would have happily paid \302\2435 for it!. But until then ill wait until you actyaly make a game that has no massive bugs, the gameplay of this one ( without terrain faults) and with multiplayer and then i might buy another one of your games until then i think ill pass and save myself some money.
reviews.author: James O\'Donovan

reviews.title: Just too expensive!
reviews.comment: Great game but only after spending over $100.00! Drop the price or give higher bonuses so the game can be finished enjoyably without being scammed. Do so and you\'ll get 5 stars but till then, 1 star... Also, be careful when updating as for some reason the app decided to uninstall itself and have lost all generals, upgrades, medals etc! Well done you idiots! You definitely deserve the 1 star now!!!! Shame that the game is good...

reviews.title: What a let down...
reviews.comment: The game its self is a bit less fun then the others and what really gets me is the price for \'extras\'  Its $50 to buy 4 top tier generals... that\'s not even close to funny, that is in point of fact the worst price tag they have yet put in a game. So yea you get one star for dropping the play value and upping the price of what you need in order to finish the game, with out playing the same level 13 times in row. New \'features\' like terrain, are really rather pointless. I got a question, why not make a good game and charge a fair price instead of making a mediocre game and trying to rip us off?
reviews.author: Tag Boss

reviews.title: Very very very 999999x NICE
reviews.comment: For easy tech, please respond this comment. This was an Excellent, perfect, and Realistic war simulation of ww2, but why the army cannot move 2 times or 3 times? And, why the supply force is so hard? NB: Sorry for my bad english, i am Indonesian

reviews.comment: almost unplayable after the last update...very laggy on galaxy 8.0 and Excite Pro...please fix
reviews.author: P Pyxus

reviews.title: Could be a LOT better.
reviews.comment: Unit capabilities are questionable. Terrain is more movement hinderance rather than tactical consideration. And lets just say the other generals that are supposed to be  helping you out....never went to war college. Nor do they follow the order of battle given many times. Not bad tho. Closest thing to a REAL Panzer General game yet. Why cant they just remake PG again?
reviews.author: Jim Stone

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I have no idea why anyone would moan about this game. Good graphics, great game play and loads of scenarios
reviews.author: shaun freeman

reviews.title: It needs work
reviews.comment: Even when I am not playing glory of generals it crashes anything I am using. From touch wiz to any other game. I also agree with another reviewer. You would have to refight the battles thousands of times to get enough to buy 1 decent general. I did enjoy the game on the first few battles until the opponent became so difficult I had to replay battles for extra cash (I got 1 gold piece every 20 minute battle, not worth it). Unless some major changes occur I dont think I will ever buy another game from them.
reviews.author: Ron Mayer

reviews.comment: Sharp graphic display if you are a warmonger try this
